sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.text: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to these Terms.

sections.title: 3. License Grant
sections.text: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Service per these Terms.

sections.title: 4. User Conduct
items: Comply with all applicable laws and policies.
Do not misuse the Service (no hacking, spamming, or unlawful content).

sections.title: 5. Intellectual Property
sections.text: All content and code are owned by the Company or its licensors; no rights transfer except as expressly stated.

sections.title: 6. Termination
sections.text: We may suspend or terminate access for violations or other reasons with notice.

sections.title: 7. Changes to Terms
sections.text: We may revise these Terms; changes take effect when posted with a new effective date.
